VTS For Office

You give the world a place to work. We give you a platform to prosper.

From regionally-based firms to institutional investors to REITS, VTS gives landlords the insights needed to position spaces to match real-time market demand â€“ reducing downtime and increasing tenant retention.

Request Demo

Intuitive software built for office landlords.

PORTFOLIO ANALYTICS & REPORTING

Streamline portfolio reporting and revenue forecasting. Reduce portfolio risk with encumbrance and co-tenancy clause tracking and alerts.

DEAL PIPELINE MANAGEMENT

Improve deal conversation rates, close deals faster and decrease downtime. Leverage real-time market and tenant data. Generate critical reports with a single click.

TENANT RELATIONSHIP MANAGEMENT

Better manage tenant relationships by tracking portfolio-wide contacts, leases and interactions in one place. Accelerate new leasing by leveraging in-place tenant relationships across your portfolio.

DYNAMIC STACKING PLANS

Track the status of every tenant, deal and option on an asset level. Automatically populate your stacking plan with up-to-date data through a seamless integration with your accounting system.

PROPERTY MARKETING

Unlock intel on market demand, leasing activity and in-place tenants. Create smarter property marketing strategies that generate more leads and bigger returns.

REAL-TIME COLLABORATION WITH PARTNERS

Real-time leasing updates from brokers and joint venture partners means youâ€™ll never wait for a leasing report again. View updates in-app and via automated email alerts.
